faqs.question: Can I install a sound system in more than one room?
faqs.answer: Yes, most providers offer multi-room systems that allow you to control sound independently in different areas of your home.

faqs.question: Do I need a smart home system to install home audio?
faqs.answer: Not necessarily. Audio systems can work independently, but they can also be integrated into smart home platforms if preferred.
